name: "Miss Sweet-and-Sour"
description: A tour balloon styled after the famed "Nanasian" of Easybreeze Holiday Resort, its gleaming golden hue ensures high visibility, even from afar.\nThe Nanasian, a local fruit famed for its golden skin and sweet-tart flavor, is often juiced and served as a refreshing remedy against the summer heat. It has come to symbolize cool relief. With this buoyant guide leading the way, visitors can rest assured they'll escape the sweltering sun and embrace the vibrant, tangy pleasures of vacation.
